title: Marconi Lima Joins TypeTrust
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312190641/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 6.Mar.2008 1.11pm 

Marconi Lima was announced today as TypeTrust’s newest associate. With 15+ years as a graphic designer and art director he joins an amazing [group of type designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312190641/http:/www.typetrust.com/designers). Lima adds Adriane Text to TypeTrust’s already [significant list of available fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312190641/http:/www.typetrust.com/index.php).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312190641im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TTTeBlast_Adriane_05_3623.gif)

Download a specimen of Adriane and see for yourself:

author: Miss Tiffany
